entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is being lectured by Professor Umbridge. He is mentioned as speaking to Ron under his voice.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and classmate. He is mentioned as responding to Harry's comment about Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a Hogwarts professor who is being lectured by Harry. She is described as following Professor McGonagall around the class.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a Hogwarts professor who is being followed by Professor Umbridge. She is mentioned as telling students to pack away.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a Hogwarts professor who is being followed by Professor Umbridge. She is not explicitly mentioned in the context of this passage.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is a student at Hogwarts who is passing around a box containing mouse tails.

relationships.description: Professor Umbridge follows Professor McGonagall around the class.
Professor Umbridge had followed Professor Trelawney in a previous context.
Harry speaks to Ron under his voice.
Professor Umbridge is followed by Professor McGonagall.
Harry is being lectured by Professor Umbridge.
Ron passes a box containing mouse tails to Lavender.
